import React from 'react' function ArrayOp(props) { const {gr,setGr,ch,st} = props const addValue = (e) => { e.preventDefault() let index = document.getElementById("input1").value index = parseInt(index,10) const value = document.getElementById("input2").value const myStruc = (st.find(e => e.id === ch.id).tile) //array of coordinates const newGrid = gr.slice() const myIndex = myStruc[index] const i0 = myIndex[0] const i1 = myIndex[1] const tile = newGrid[i0][i1] const newTile= { ...tile, txt:`${value}` } newGrid[i0][i1] = newTile setGr(newGrid) } const removeValue = (e) => { e.preventDefault() let index = document.getElementById("input1").value index = parseInt(index,10) const myStruc = (st.find(e => e.id === ch.id).tile) //array of coordinates const newGrid = gr.slice() const myIndex = myStruc[index] console.log(m) const i0 = myIndex[0] const i1 = myIndex[1] const tile = newGrid[i0][i1] const newTile= { ...tile, txt:`` } newGrid[i0][i1] = newTile setGr(newGrid) } return (
see items
) } export default ArrayOp
